name: Your God Says
description:
"Your god says" is a fast paced ability game made for the Global Game Jam 2016. You must correctly perform each ritual so your god dosen't kill its workshippers.

TEAM

Progammers: Sebastián Ziegler, Andrés Álvarez and Guillermo Andrade

Art: Tomás Bruckner

Music/SFX: Sebastián Ziegler

Game Design: Tomás Bruckner

Made in 48 hours
